name: Duck Duck Loose
description:
What is Duck Duck Loose?

Mama Duck’s children have fallen into the sewer and it’s up to you to reunite this loving family. With only Mama Duck’s voice to guide them, one of the brood must traverse underground perils while Mama Duck simultaneously faces the streets above. Navigate both Mama Duck and Baby Duck through this 2D side-scrolling platform adventure.

How to play

Control Mama Duck and Baby Duck through two levels at once.

  • Left and right arrow - Ducks move
  • Space bar - Jump
  • C - Mama Duck crouches and Baby Duck hovers

Play on the browser above.

A GMTK21 game

Duck Duck Loose is the first game by indie developers Dodgy Jammers. We created it in just 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021. This version was submitted on 13th June 2021 and cannot be edited until the jam ends.

Dodgy Jammers are a group of nine friends:

  • Spencer Hall
  • Wesley Hall
  • Lee Tanner
  • Colin Tortoise
  • Andrew Wise
  • Ellen Stubbings
  • Max Tanner
  • Ken Caffrey
  • Dani Barge
